title: Sure, here's a reading list of 20 articles on knowledge-enhanced dialogue systems (KEDS) for response generation, covering recent advancements up to 2024
**"A Survey on Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - This comprehensive survey provides an overview of various techniques and methodologies used in KEDS
**"Integrating External Knowledge for Response Generation in Open-Domain Dialogue Systems"** - Discusses methods for incorporating external knowledge bases into dialogue systems
**"Knowledge-Grounded Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"** - Explores the use of pre-trained models like GPT-3 for knowledge-grounded dialogue
*Transactions of the Association for Computational Linguistics
**"Dynamic Knowledge Graph Enhanced Dialogue Generation"** - Introduces dynamic knowledge graphs to improve the relevance and coherence of responses
**"Commonsense Knowledge in Dialogue Systems: A Survey"** - Reviews the role of commonsense knowledge in enhancing dialogue systems
**"End-to-End Knowledge-Retrieval and Dialogue Generation"** - Proposes an end-to-end framework for integrating knowledge retrieval with dialogue generation

container-title: *Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence

title: **"Personalized Dialogue Generation with Knowledge Graphs"** - Focuses on personalizing responses using user-specific knowledge graphs
**"Multi-Modal Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Explores the integration of multi-modal data (text, images, etc.) for richer dialogue generation

container-title: - *IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems

title: **"Context-Aware Knowledge Retrieval for Dialogue Systems"** - Discusses context-aware techniques for retrieving relevant knowledge during a conversation
**"Zero-Shot Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Generation"** - Investigates zero-shot learning approaches for incorporating knowledge into dialogue systems
**"Knowledge-Augmented Transformer Models for Dialogue Generation"** - Examines the use of transformer models augmented with external knowledge
**"Interactive Knowledge Graph Construction for Dialogue Systems"** - Proposes methods for constructing and updating knowledge graphs interactively during dialogues
*Proceedings of the IJCAI
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems for Task-Oriented Applications"** - Focuses on the application of KEDS in task-oriented dialogue systems
**"Explainable AI in Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Discusses the importance of explainability in KEDS and methods to achieve it
**"Benchmarking Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Proposes benchmarks and evaluation metrics for assessing KEDS
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems for Healthcare Applications"** - Explores the use of KEDS in healthcare, focusing on patient interaction and support
**"Scalable Knowledge Integration for Dialogue Systems"** - Discusses scalable methods for integrating large-scale knowledge bases into dialogue systems
*Proceedings of the NeurIPS
**"Adversarial Training for Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Investigates adversarial training techniques to improve the robustness of KEDS
**"Ethical Considerations in Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Reviews ethical issues and best practices in the development and deployment of KEDS
**"Future Directions in Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Systems"** - Provides insights into emerging trends and future research directions in KEDS
These articles should provide a solid foundation for understanding the current state and future directions of knowledge-enhanced dialogue systems for response generation
